mapper.insert: insert into user_details (id, user_id, email, age, gender, constellation, edu, job, hobby, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{constellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hobby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user_details set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, constellation = #{constellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edu = #{edu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hobby = #{hobby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, email, age, gender, constellation, edu, job, hobby, create_time, update_time from user_details where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_id, email, age, gender, constellation, edu, job, hobby, create_time, update_time from user_details
